posts.post_content:
Posted By: craig lankford
I have decided to let go of all my OJs that dont feature players from des moines.  make me offers in cash or will trade for des moines OJs of players/poses that i still need.  I have scans for each of these to send. none of them are slabbed, i've never had anything graded before so i will let the scans speak for themselves.

email me at dmbbfan@aol.com.

here is what i have left.

1. ed beatin-cleveland, pitching chin behind left arm
   $60
2. dick buckley-indianapolis, about to hit low ball
   $60
3. john mcglone-cleveland, tagging player two-player card
   $60
4. jumbo schoeneck-indianapolis, fielding grounder
   $60
5. sam barkley-pittsburgh, right hand above head, 2nd B
   $60
6. bob clark-brooklyns, hands on hips
   $125
7. jim donnelly-washington, fielding, hands shoulder high, third base
   $60
8. jack farrell-baltimores, bat at ready position, looking at camera, 
   $45                    field background, 2nd B.
9. elmer foster-n.y., throwing
   $90-SOLD
10. dave foutz-brooklyn, bat at ready position at 30 degrees
   $75-SOLD
11.frank gilmore-washington, ball touching right hand above head
   SOLD
12. gus krock-chicagos, right hand chin high
   SOLD
13.tom tucker-baltimores, throwing
   SOLD
